revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WAP54A |revision= |upc=745883552337 |asin=B000066JQS |fcc_date=04/17/2002 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WX5558 |type=access point |fcc_id=PKW-WAP54A, HEDACCWA5001 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Motorola |cpu1_model=MPC8245;XPC8245LZU266B; |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=E28F640J3A-120 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC2M32B2 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5210A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5110 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=a |wi1_ant_conn=MMCX |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=National Semiconductor |eth_chip1_model=DP83815 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=a |default_ssid=linksys |default_ssid_regex=^linksys$ |default_ip=192.168.1.252 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:06:25 |oui_eth=00:06:25 }} {{TagLine|Instant Wireless Access Point}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WAP54A}}
This device's board appears to be quite similar to :the [[Atheros AR5BAP-00030]] reference design. It is presumed to be using most of the same parts :as the [[SMC SMC2755W]], which is based on AP30.
The power adapter included with the device is a :''[[Linksys]]'' MS15-050250-A1D (DC5.0V, 2.5A).
==Images== <gallery caption="from Linksys"> File:Linksys WAP54A.png|Linksys WAP54A </gallery>
